title: Stop Being So Judgy: 7 Ways to Clear Blocks to What You Want
description:
Today’s Dear Gabby is a BIG one. In this episode, I’ll teach you the mindset shift that will change EVERY area of your life! This shift will take the focus off of what’s not working and amplify what you really want. I’ll also give you spiritual tools to cope with the more triggering aspects of the holiday season, so you don’t get stuck in a judgment cycle that brings down your vibes. This podcast will ensure that your holidays are awesome and set you up to win for the year ahead.  

Press play on today’s Dear Gabby to learn:

  • The fastest way to get what you want … and stop attracting what you DON’T want
  • How to lay a spiritual foundation so that you can handle anything that comes at you with grace and ease (because being a Super Attractor is NOT about living a perfect life!)
  • How to welcome a “bad thing” as a spiritual assignment, knowing that the Universe has your back
  • How to radically change your life by adopting a solution-oriented mindset
  • How to process your big feelings and come out the other side with unshakable resilience
Resources:
 
The following are helpful resources and books I mention within the episode:

MIRACLE MEMBERSHIP:
Want even more support? I created the Miracle Membership to help you design a spiritual practice you can stick to—so you can feel connected, supported and inspired every day. Each month I deliver brand new workshops, guided meditations, live group meditations, community connection, and so much more. Plus, it’s easy to access on your phone, computer or tablet. Click here to join: https://bit.ly/3oJPXke
 
MASTERCLASSES & CHALLENGES
  • Spirit Junkie Masterclass: https://bit.ly/3FkGkim
  • Manifesting Challenge: https://bit.ly/30B3aDv
  • Meditation Challenge: xhttps://bit.ly/3CkSO7O

BOOKS:
  • Add More ~ing to Your Life: https://gabbybernstein.com/shop/books/
  • Super Attractor: https://gabbybernstein.com/shop/books/
  • The Universe Has Your Back: https://gabbybernstein.com/shop/books/
  • Judgment Detox: https://gabbybernstein.com/shop/books/

MENTAL HEALTH RESOURCES: https://bit.ly/3qMAGBN
 
HAPPY DAYS BOOK LAUNCH AND VIP EVENT:
Happy Days is launching 2/22/22. You can preorder and get a  FREE VIP ticket to my Happy Days Live Online Event Experience (valued at $500) the week the book comes out. Click here to preorder the book and claim your free VIP ticket: https://bit.ly/3DrtK0p
 
 
PARTNERS
 

Start building better habits for healthier, long-term results. Sign up for your trial at Noom.com/GABBY.

 

I want you to start living a happier life today. As a listener, you’ll get 10% off your first month by visiting our sponsor at BetterHelp.com/deargabby

 

Go to arrae.com and use code ’gabby’ at checkout for 10% off of one time purchases or 25% off first month on subscription.

 

Go to BOMBAS.com/gabby, and get twenty percent off any purchase during their big holiday sale.

 

Produced by Dear Media.
